scripts.build: npm run build:css & npm run build:md
scripts.build:css: postcss --output elm.theme.css --use postcss-nested elm.theme.pcss & postcss --output js.theme.css --use postcss-nested js.theme.pcss
scripts.start: reload -b -v & chokidar "*.jade" "*.md" -c "npm run build:md" & chokidar "*.pcss" -c "npm run build:css" & chokidar "elm-react.html" -c "npm run build:html"
